p: A total of 200–300 mg of lipid fraction was mixed with 2 mL 2 M hydrochloric acid in methanol in vial with a screw cap, saponified by heating in beaker at 90 °C for 2 h. Then, the mixture after cooling was dried under an argon flow to 0.5 mL. One mL of distilled water was added and extracted thrice with 0.5 hexane. The combined hexane fraction was analyzed by GC-MS.
